00085 void GenericDataHeader::AddNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType &entry)
00086 {
00087         AddNameValParam(entry, true);
00088 }
00089 
00090 /**
00091 This override of the original method of the same name adds the parameter bool doUniqueAdds.
00092 
00093 This parameter is a hint flag to determine whether to bypass the FindParameter call within. FindParameter
00094 is used to ensure duplicates do not get entered into the collection. In most cases, the calling application is not updating or 
00095 adding parameter to the collection, but is just reading the header parameters. Through testing it has been found
00096 that bypassing the FindParameter call made, will reduce reads of the header greatly. 
00097 
00098 If an application is updating or adding parameters to the collection and require no duplicates to be added, then do not use this
00099 override method, but if you are just reading header parameters, then this will save time reading headers.
00100 */
00101 void GenericDataHeader::AddNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType &entry, bool doUniqueAdds)
00102 {
00103         if(doUniqueAdds == true)
00104         {
00105                 ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = FindNameValParam(entry);
00106                 if((ii == nameValParams.end()) == false)
00107                 {
00108                         *ii = entry;
00109                 }
00110                 else
00111                 {
00112                         paramNameIdxMap[entry.GetName()] =  nameValParams.size();
00113                         nameValParams.push_back(entry);
00114                 }
00115         }
00116         else
00117         {
00118                 paramNameIdxMap[entry.GetName()] =  nameValParams.size();
00119                 nameValParams.push_back(entry);
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00123 ParameterNameValueType GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParam(int32_t index)
00124 {
00125         return nameValParams[index];
00126 }
00127 
00128 int32_t GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamCnt() const
00129 {
00130         return (int32_t)nameValParams.size();
00131 }
00132 
00133 void GenericDataHeader::GetNameValIterators(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end)
00134 {
00135         begin = nameValParams.begin();
00136         end = nameValParams.end();
00137 }

00139 void GenericDataHeader::AddParent(const GenericDataHeader &hdr)
00140 {
00141         GenericDataHdrs.push_back(hdr);

00145 {
00146         begin = GenericDataHdrs.begin();
00147         end = GenericDataHdrs.end();

00160 /*
00161  * Find an immediate parent GenericDataHeader based on file type id.  Does not search grand-parents or above.
00162  */
00163 GenericDataHeader* GenericDataHeader::FindParent(const std::string& fileTypeId)
00164 {
00165         GenericDataHeader* parentGDH = 0;
00166         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end;
00167         GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00168         for (GenDataHdrVectorIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00169         {
00170                 if (ii->GetFileTypeId() == fileTypeId)
00171                 {
00172                         parentGDH = &(*ii);
00173                         break;
00174                 }
00175         }
00176         return parentGDH;
00177 }
00178 
00179 bool GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& result)
00180 {
00181         ParameterNameValueType t;
00182         t.SetName(name);
00183         t.SetValueText(L"");
00184         ParameterNameValueTypeIt found = FindNameValParam(t);
00185         if (found != nameValParams.end())
00186         {
00187                 result = *found;
00188                 return true;
00189         }
00190         return false;
00191 }
00192 
00193 ParameterNameValueTypeIt GenericDataHeader::FindNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType& p)
00194 {
00195   std::map<std::wstring, int>::const_iterator idx = paramNameIdxMap.find(p.GetName());
00196   if (idx == paramNameIdxMap.end()) {
00197     return nameValParams.end();
00198   }
00199   return nameValParams.begin() + idx->second;
00200 
00201 }
00202 
00203 bool GenericDataHeader::GetNameValParamsBeginsWith(const std::wstring& beginsWith, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& p)
00204 {
00205         p.clear();
00206 
00207         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = nameValParams.begin(); ii != nameValParams.end(); ++ii)
00208         {
00209                 if (ii->GetName().find(beginsWith) == 0)
00210                 {
00211                         p.push_back(*ii);
00212                 }
00213         }
00214         return (p.size() > 0);
00215 }
